Posts.Content: THANKYOU FOR YOIR REPLY I DONT FEEL SHIVERY JUST DIZZY AND SICKLY . It's just with it being OK yesterday was a bit concerned don't want to be called to the hospital for nothing. Gaynor
Posts.Title: Temperature worry

Posts.Content: Thanks for the advice temperature been normal today and I have felt .much better was worried as I felt really unwell yesterday. Gaynor
Posts.Title: Temperature worry

Posts.Content: As I only had my first chemo on Thursday I have been checking my temperature yesterday it was always reading over 36° but the last couple of times I have taken it it has taken me a while to get a reading of just 36° ,lots of readings of 35.7 - 35.9 has anyone else had a low reading I thought a high temperature was more to look out for should I be worried. Gaynor
Posts.Title: Temperature worry

Posts.Content: HI I HAD MY FIRST CHEMO TREATMENT YESTERDAY AND WAS WONDERING IF ANYONE HAS ANY ADVISE ON WHEN YOU FEEL THE WORST AT THE MOMENT APART FROM FEELING SICK AND OFF MY FOOD I DON'T FEEL TOO BAD JUST WONDERING IF THE WORST IS YET TO COME I HAD EPIRUBICIN AND CYCLOPHOSPHIDE ANY ADVICE WOULD BE GREATLY APPRECIATED GAYNOR
Posts.Title: First chemo treatment yesterday

Posts.Content: Went to bed last night feeling hopeful that I was going to get away with just feeling sick but at three o clock this morning I woke up feeling terrible couldn't get of bed. Feel like I am on a rollercoaster and I can't get off. Gaynor
Posts.Title: First chemo treatment yesterday

Posts.Content: Thankyou for your advise hope everything goes well on Tuesday take care. Gaynor
